clinical_study.brief_title: Validation of a Specific Measure for Assessment of Compliance With Treatment in Patients With Hemophilia
clinical_study.official_title: Validation of a Specific Measure for Assessment of Compliance With Treatment in Patients With Hemophilia. Veritas-Pro Project

brief_summary.textblock: Research project for validation of a questionnaire on compliance to treatment in patients with hemophilia. It is intended to validate the American VERITAS-PRO scale according to the international methodology validation questionnaires: reverse translation, according to intersubject patients, psychometric validation and reliability analysis with large sample of patients.

detailed_description.textblock: The validated questionnaire obtained in this project will identify the actual degree of patient compliance to drug therapy, using as gold standard the difference between the treatment prescribed and administered.

primary_outcome.measure: Translation of the original questionnaire (English) to Spanish
primary_outcome.description: Three health experienced in the treatment of hemophilia and knowledge of English, translated into Spanish the HAL and HEP questionnaire. Two native speakers (English and Spanish), reverse-translate the original text of the HAL and HEP questionnaires and the text translated by the Spanish health.

primary_outcome.measure: The translated version of the questionnaire
primary_outcome.description: 10 patients with hemophilia adults enrolled randomly will participate in the pilotage. The clarity of the questions in Spanish translated version and the relevance of each of the items of the questionnaires will be evaluated.

primary_outcome.measure: Sending the questionnaire to a large sample of patients for final validation
primary_outcome.description: 70 patients with hemophilia will participate in the pilotage. The validity and reliability of the Spanish version translated from the questionnaires will be assessed.

arm_group.description: Sample of patients with haemophilia over 18 years of age that will participate in piloting of reliability and validity of the Spanish version of the Veritas-Pro questionnaire.

intervention.description: Piloting of reliability and validity of the Spanish version of the Veritas-Pro questionnaire.

study_pop.textblock: Patients with haemophilia around the country that will participate in study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with hemophilia A and B
- Patients who have previously signed the informed consent document
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with other congenital coaghulopatías (eg, Von Willebrand's disease)
- Patients with cognitive impairment, or oral or written understanding
